Docs.param: Mask created of one or more values.
Docs.summary: Creates new Hasher to compute message digests for given set of hashing algorithms.
Docs.remarks:
Mask should be created from ORed HashType values. The next example will create Hasher that computes both CRC32 and MD5 sums:
new Hasher((uint)HashType.CRC32 | (uint)HashType.MD5);
Docs.exception: Argument is zero or contains invalid bits.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Reset ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

Docs.summary: Resets this Hasher to initial state.
Docs.remarks: The Hasher becomes available to process new data chunks. Note, that this method returns Hasher to the state after creating the object, NOT the state when hashing continues. Therefore, all previously calculated hashes are lost and process starts from the very beginning.
